title: Lizardman shaman/Strategies

properties.name: description
properties.value: Lizardman shamans are popular monsters hunted by players for their fabled dragon warhammer drop, which fetches a very high price due to its extremely useful special attack for high level PvM encounters. This guide will give a few tips and some setups to help out with your kills.

content:
Lizardman shamans are popular monsters hunted by players for their fabled dragon warhammer drop, which fetches a very high price due to its extremely useful special attack for high level PvM encounters. This guide will give a few tips and some setups to help out with your kills.

Contents

  • 1 Requirements
  • 2 Location
  • 3 Attacks
  • 4 Suggested skills
  • 5 Equipment

Requirements[edit | edit source]

  • 100% Shayzien favour; (Unless killing during Chambers of Xeric)

Location[edit | edit source]

From Xeric's Inferno, follow the blue arrow to reach the shamans, or use the fairy ring and go north down the ladder to the west.

Lizardman shamans can be found in three locations:

  • Western side of the Lizardman Canyon - contains three shamans in a large, multi-combat area.
  • Lizardman Caves on the northern end of the Lizardman Settlement - contains eight shamans in a small, single-way area, with two shamans in each room. These can only be killed while on a lizardman Slayer task.
  • Lizardman Temple beneath Molch - contains six shamans in a small, single-way area, with two shamans in each room.
Fast travel options to reach the Lizardman Caves

Attacks[edit | edit source]

Lizardman shamans use the following attacks:

  • Melee attack - a standard melee attack sharing the same animation as the other lizardmen.
  • Ranged attack - a standard ranged attack sharing the same animation as the other lizardmen. This attack can poison.
  • Special attacks - Lizardman shamans have three special attacks that can be used without cooldown:
    • Acid spit - The shaman spits a large ball of acid at the player's current location. This will deal unblockable poison damage for up to 30 damage. This attack can poison. The damage reduces if you wear a full set of Shayzien armour, obtained from fighting the soldiers in the Combat Ring. Wearing the full tier 5 Shayzien set negates all damage done by this attack, though you can still be poisoned.
    • Jump - The shaman jumps into the air before crashing down at the player's location when they jumped. This can be avoided by moving out of the way. If the shaman stomps you, you will take heavy damage which cannot be blocked.
    • Spawns - The shaman summons three spawns - two next to the player and one under the player, who will follow the player upon spawning, unless the spawns are summoned in a position where they cannot see the player. After several seconds, the spawn will explode, dealing 8-10 damage to players that are two spaces or less from it when it explodes. The minion who spawns under the player will always explode first.

Lizardman shamans have an attack range of 8, which means that weapons like longbows, composite bows, the crystal bow, and the Bow of faerdhinen can outrange it on rapid, and weapons like shortbows, crossbows, and Karil's crossbow can outrange it on longrange.

Suggested skills[edit | edit source]

  • 80+
  • 80+
  • 20+ (60+ Recommended)
  • 60+
  • 40+ (43+ Recommended)

Equipment[edit | edit source]

Optimal spot to set-up cannon in north-west corner, a few spaces west of the obstruction.

Using Ranged is recommended as this allows better maneuvering, although Melee is also viable. Lizardman shamans are weak to both combat styles; specifically, they have negative stab defence and no ranged defence bonuses. Slash, crush and magical attacks are not recommended as they have high defensive bonuses against those styles.

If killing lizardman shamans on task, it is strongly recommended to have completed the hard Kourend & Kebos Diary to have the Shayzien armour effect to your Slayer helmet via Captain Cleive. If you do not have the diary completed, you will take some damage from the acid spit attack if wearing the Slayer helmet, and it can deal a lot of damage over time.

If you have not completed the diary, it's best to wear the Shayzien helm (5) regardless of combat class.

Activate Protect from Missiles and your best offensive prayer, and if using, set up your dwarf multicannon in the north-west corner near the obstruction in Lizardman Canyon as indicated in the image above. Focus primarily on killing the north-west and south-west spawns. Always pay attention to all special attacks, namely leaping and summoning minions. Move out of the way as soon as you see them jump, and dodge the minions by manoeuvring around an obstacle or moving a few spaces away. As a ranger, always keep distance, and work the obstacles. Note that hugging the obstacle or wall in the canyon prevents the shamans from jumping, this does NOT work in the shaman temple, and Shamans will still jump even if you are hugging a wall.

Recommended equipment for Ranged
SlotItem (most effective → least effective)
Slayer helmet / Slayer helmet (i) (with hard diary completed)Shayzien helm (5)[1]N/AN/AN/A
Necklace of anguishBonecrusher necklaceDragonbone necklace[2]Amulet of furyAmulet of glory
Ava's assemblerSoul cape / Ardougne cloak 4 (if using Bow of faerdhinen) Ranging cape (trimmed)Ava's accumulatorN/A
Shayzien body (5)[1]N/AN/AN/AN/A
Shayzien greaves (5)[1]N/AN/AN/AN/A
Toxic blowpipe (with adamant darts or better, ideally amethyst darts)Bow of faerdhinenTwisted bowKaril's crossbowRune crossbow / Magic shortbow (i) / Crystal bow
None if using two-handed weapons.Book of lawUnholy bookBook of balanceBlack d'hide shield
Rada's blessing 4 (if using Toxic blowpipe or Bow of faerdhinen)God blessing / Rada's blessing 3/2 (if using Toxic blowpipe or Bow of faerdhinen)Bolt rack (if using Karil's crossbow)Rune arrow or better (if using Twisted bow or magic shortbow (i))Broad bolts or better (if using a crossbow)
Shayzien gloves (5)[1]N/AN/AN/AN/A
Shayzien boots (5)[1]N/AN/AN/AN/A
Ring of the gods (i)Ring of suffering (i)Archers ring (i)Brimstone ringExplorer's ring 4/3 / Ring of wealth

Inventory[edit | edit source]

  • 2 divine ranging potions
  • 1 antidote++ or 2 superantipoisons
  • 2-3 stamina potions
  • 6-8 prayer potions
  • Dwarf multicannon and cannonballs
  • Rune pouch with nature, lava and water runes to cast High Level Alchemy and Bones to Peaches (optional but strongly recommended)
  • Bones to peaches (tablet) (optional but not needed if spell is unlocked and bringing said runes)
  • Xeric's talisman
  • An emergency teleport
  • Rest monkfish or better

Inventory[edit | edit source]

  • 2 divine ranging potions
  • 1 antidote++ or 2 superantipoisons
  • 2-3 stamina potions
  • 6-8 prayer potions
  • Rune pouch with nature, lava and water runes to cast High Level Alchemy and Bones to Peaches (optional but strongly recommended)
  • Bones to peaches (tablet) (optional but not needed if spell is unlocked and bringing said runes)
  • Xeric's talisman
  • An emergency teleport
  • Rest monkfish or better

Inventory[edit | edit source]

  • 3-4 divine ranging potions
  • 2 antidote++ or 3-4 superantipoisons
  • 1 stamina potion (optional)
  • Rune pouch with nature, lava and water runes to cast High Level Alchemy and Bones to Peaches (optional but strongly recommended)
  • Bones to peaches (tablet) (optional but not needed if spell is unlocked and bringing said runes)
  • An emergency teleport
  • 1-2 emergency food (optional)
  • Rest prayer potions

Activate Protect from Melee, and if using, set up your dwarf multicannon north-west by the obstruction in Lizardman Canyon, or set up your cannon in the open area south-west. Always pay attention to all special attacks, namely leaping and summoning minions regardless. Move out of the way as soon as you see them jump, and dodge the minions by manoeuvring around an obstacle or moving a few spaces away.

Recommended equipment for Melee
SlotItem (most effective → least effective)
Slayer helmet / Slayer helmet (i) (with hard diary completed)Shayzien helm (5)[1]N/AN/AN/A
Amulet of tortureAmulet of furyAmulet of gloryAmulet of powerAmulet of strength
Infernal capeFire capeArdougne cloak 4 Cape of AccomplishmentArdougne cloak 3
Shayzien body (5)[1]N/AN/AN/AN/A
Shayzien greaves (5)[1]N/AN/AN/AN/A
Scythe of viturGhrazi rapierZamorakian hastaAbyssal dagger (p++)Abyssal tentacle
Avernic defenderDragon defender / Dragonfire shieldRune defender / Toktz-ket-xilN/AN/A
Rada's blessing 4God blessing / Rada's blessing 3/2N/AN/AN/A
Shayzien gloves (5)[1]N/AN/AN/AN/A
Shayzien boots (5)[1]N/AN/AN/AN/A
Berserker ring (i)Ring of suffering (i)Brimstone ringRing of the gods (i)Treasonous ring (i)
Saradomin godswordDragon clawsDragon daggerCrystal halberdN/A

Inventory[edit | edit source]

  • Special attack weapon
  • 1-2 Divine super combat potions
  • 1-2 Superantipoisons or Antidotes (not needed if wearing Serpentine helm)
  • 3-4 Prayer potions (6-8 if using Piety)
  • Rune pouch with nature, lava and water runes to cast High Level Alchemy and Bones to Peaches (optional but strongly recommended)
  • Dwarf multicannon and cannonballs (optional)
  • Xeric's talisman
  • An emergency teleport
  • Rest monkfish or higher

Inventory[edit | edit source]

  • Special attack weapon
  • 1-2 Divine super combat potions
  • 1-2 Superantipoisons or Antidotes (not needed if wearing Serpentine helm)
  • 3-4 Prayer potions (6-8 if using Piety)
  • Rune pouch with nature, lava and water runes to cast High Level Alchemy and Bones to Peaches (optional but strongly recommended)
  • Bones to peaches (tablet) (optional but not needed if spell is unlocked and bringing said runes)
  • Xeric's talisman
  • An emergency teleport
  • Rest monkfish or higher

  1. ^ 1.0 1.1 1.2 1.3 1.4 1.5 1.6 1.7 1.8 1.9 Full tier-5 Shayzien armour will nullify the shamans' acid.
  2. ^ Use with Bonecrusher for longer trips.
rawContent:
[[Lizardman shaman]]s are popular monsters hunted by players for their fabled [[dragon warhammer]] drop, which fetches a very high price due to its extremely useful [[special attack]] for high level [[PvM]] encounters. This guide will give a few tips and some setups to help out with your kills.

==Requirements==
*100% [[Shayzien favour]]; (Unless killing during Chambers of Xeric)

==Location==
[[File:Lizardman Shaman location 1.png|thumb|From Xeric's Inferno, follow the blue arrow to reach the shamans, or use the fairy ring and go north down the ladder to the west.]]
Lizardman shamans can be found in three locations:
*Western side of the [[Lizardman Canyon]] - contains three shamans in a large, [[multi-combat area]].
*[[Lizardman Caves]] on the northern end of the [[Lizardman Settlement]] - contains eight shamans in a small, [[single-way area]], with two shamans in each room. These can only be killed while on a [[lizardman]] [[Slayer task]].
*[[Lizardman Temple]] beneath [[Molch]] - contains six shamans in a small, [[single-way area]], with two shamans in each room.

[[File:Lizardman Shaman location 2.png|thumb|Fast travel options to reach the Lizardman Caves]]

==Attacks==
[[Lizardman shaman]]s use the following attacks:
*[[Melee]] attack - a standard melee attack sharing the same animation as the other lizardmen.
*[[Ranged]] attack - a standard ranged attack sharing the same animation as the other lizardmen. This attack can poison.
*[[Special attack]]s - Lizardman shamans have three special attacks that can be used without cooldown:
**Acid spit - The shaman spits a large ball of acid at the player's current location. This will deal unblockable [[poison]] damage for up to 30 damage. This attack can poison. The damage reduces if you wear a full set of [[Shayzien armour]], obtained from fighting the soldiers in the [[Combat Ring (Shayzien)|Combat Ring]]. Wearing the full tier 5 Shayzien set negates all damage done by this attack, though you can still be poisoned.
**Jump - The shaman jumps into the air before crashing down at the player's location when they jumped. This can be avoided by moving out of the way. If the shaman stomps you, you will take heavy damage which cannot be blocked. 
**Spawns - The shaman summons three [[Spawn (lizardman shaman)|spawns]] - two next to the player and one under the player, who will follow the player upon spawning, unless the spawns are summoned in a position where they cannot see the player. After several seconds, the spawn will explode, dealing 8-10 damage to players that are two spaces or less from it when it explodes. The minion who spawns under the player will always explode first.

[[Lizardman shaman|Lizardman shamans]] have an attack range of 8, which means that weapons like [[longbows]], [[Composite bow|composite bows]], the [[crystal bow]], and the [[Bow of faerdhinen]] can outrange it on rapid, and weapons like [[shortbows]], [[crossbows]], and [[Karil's crossbow]] can outrange it on longrange.

==Suggested skills==
*{{SCP|Attack|80+}}
*{{SCP|Strength|80+}}
*{{SCP|Defence|20+}} (60+ Recommended)
*{{SCP|Ranged|60+}}
*{{SCP|Prayer|40+}} (43+ Recommended)

==Equipment==
[[File:Shaman cannon set-up spot.png|thumb|Optimal spot to set-up cannon in north-west corner, a few spaces west of the obstruction.]]
Using [[Ranged]] is recommended as this allows better maneuvering, although [[Melee]] is also viable. Lizardman shamans are weak to both combat styles; specifically, they have negative [[stab]] defence and no ranged [[defence bonuses]]. [[Slash]], [[crush]] and [[magical]] attacks are not recommended as they have high defensive bonuses against those styles.

If killing lizardman shamans on task, it is strongly recommended to have completed the [[hard Kourend & Kebos Diary]] to have the [[Shayzien armour]] effect to your [[Slayer helmet]] via [[Captain Cleive]]. If you do not have the diary completed, you will take some damage from the acid spit attack if wearing the Slayer helmet, and it can deal a lot of damage over time.

If you have not completed the diary, it's best to wear the [[Shayzien helm (5)]] regardless of [[combat class]].

<tabber>

Activate [[Protect from Missiles]] and your best offensive prayer, and if using, set up your [[dwarf multicannon]] in the north-west corner near the obstruction in [[Lizardman Canyon]] as indicated in the image above. Focus primarily on killing the north-west and south-west spawns.

Always pay attention to all [[special attack]]s, namely leaping and summoning [[Spawn (lizardman shaman)|minions]]. Move out of the way as soon as you see them jump, and dodge the minions by manoeuvring around an obstacle or moving a few spaces away. As a ranger, always keep distance, and work the obstacles. Note that hugging the obstacle or wall in the canyon prevents the shamans from jumping, this does NOT work in the shaman temple, and Shamans will still jump even if you are hugging a wall.

}}
